title: The Garden Juicery
description: A 100% organic vegan/vegetarian juice bar serving cold pressed juices and raw living foods. The only non-vegan item on the menu is honey. Also offers cleanse programs, superfood smoothies, made-in-house nut milks, snacks and cold pressed juices on tap. Seasonal flavors keep the menu rotating. The entire menu is raw, organic, plant-based, gluten-free and dairy-free.
